chapters.title: Chapter 46:  Other Battles, Other Weapons
chapters.info: Pevin, p. 736 (522)—Cairhienin refugee who now carries the Aes Sedai (black and white circle) banner. He lost his wife and sister to famine, his brother and one son to civil war, and another son and brother to Andoran soldiers and bandits. His last son and his daughter were killed when the Shaido attacked Cairhien.
